summary: This document is an email exchange from May 2011 where an unidentified person asks Jeffrey Epstein if they can stay with him in New York City. Epstein's response indicates he is in Paris at the time. The email shows personal communication and travel coordination involving Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The sender of the email, responding from Paris to a request about staying at his place in New York City.

events.title: Unidentified person's planned NYC trip
events.description: An unidentified person plans to travel to New York City from Thursday to Monday, seeking accommodation with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein in Paris
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein sends an email indicating he is currently in Paris.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in Paris as of May 9, 2011, according to an email sent from his iPad.
An unidentified person sought to stay at Epstein's New York City residence during a trip in May 2011.
The email exchange demonstrates personal communication and travel coordination involving Epstein in 2011.
